metadata.inclusion:
1. Press Enter on the lock
2. Enter programming code and confirm
3. Enter 9 and confirm
4. Two long beeps indicate successful programming, three short beeps indicate failure
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press Enter on the lock
2. Enter programming code and confirm
3. Enter 9 and confirm
4. Two long beeps indicate successful programming, three short beeps indicate failure
metadata.reset: Press and hold the R button for more than 5 seconds until you hear 3 long beeps
